name: ASCII Fantasy
short_description:
ASCII Fantasy is a RPG game project. The game is written in C++ and will support Linux and Windows OS platforms.
The idea of the project is to create a RPG game that uses ASCII art to show the creatures and places you will encounter during your journey.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
